file_content.text: Ah, sir? Sorry to bother you, but I'm running inventory on our water rations....
Well, sir, it appears you've exceeded your designated allotment. By a lot, actually.
It's this bloody heat, Private. Makes me sweat. I need my baths.
Er, right. It's just that water's rather scarce out here, so if it's not too much trouble....
I'm willing to make a few concessions for this planet, but my hygiene is not among them!
